name: Holy Britannian Empire
startIntroPart2: This is a nation base of the code geass anime.
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to become another area!
attacked: You dare challange me!? You shall perish!
defeated: is this the power of geass at play? If only I could reach raganarok.
introduction: We will fight on, we shall struggle, compete, plunder and dominate, and in the end, the future shall be ours. ALL HAIL BRITANNIA!!!
hateNo: I shall not agree to that!
afterPeace: I hear and obey, your Majesty.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
